title: The Duchess of Sussex's South Africa tourdrobe: see every detail of her 14 outfits
text:
The Duke and Duchess have completed their 10-day royal tour of South Africa, where they have visited a number of charitable organisations.

The tour was the couple's - and baby Archie's - first since their son was born in May; Meghan was pregnant during their last tour, when they visited Australia, Fiji, Tonga and New Zealand.

Preparing a royal tour-drobe involves months of planning and, as expected, we saw plenty of stylish looks from Meghan while she was in South Africa.

Click through the gallery to see everything Meghan wore on tour...
